Description Text: Classic 50's rancher in well-established neighborhood. Home features bay window in the living room, electric fireplace for that cozy evening feeling, large eat-in kitchen, partially finished basement and fenced yard. Home is an estate and is being sold as-is. Home warranty included.

Don't miss this underpriced gem. Beautiful split level home in fabulous neighborhood of Clearview Manor in Bethlehem. Walk to the elementary school, public pools and recreation areas. Great home with upgrades of newer kitchen, central air and replacement windows. Roof replaced 3 yrs ago, A/C in 2024, furnace in 2022 and hot water heater 2yrs old. There is wiring for a generator. Enjoy the large relaxing areas of the family room and oversized living room, and dining room. Eat in kitchen, appliances, washer and dryer all included. Hardwood floors in most areas make this a charming home. Extra storage in basement with cedar closet and shelving. Fabulous backyard, covered porch and accessible to everything. Don't hesitate to call to see this one before it goes to auction. This outstanding home and incredible location won't last.

Welcome in to this 2 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath brick ranch, ideally situated in Bethlehem City. Step inside to discover hardwood floors that flow throughout the living spaces, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The cozy living room features a charming fireplace, ideal for those chilly evenings or for entertaining friends and family. The upgraded kitchen features butcher block countertops and newer appliances, combined with the spacious dining room is perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Enjoy the sunroom/breezeway however suits you, your house plants will love the natural light that fills this space. The attached one car garage offers convenience and extra storage. Outside enjoy the privacy of a fenced-in backyard, perfect for pets, gardening, or outdoor gatherings. Dont miss out on this beautiful home, where modern living meets comfort!

Highest and Best due Sat11/2 by 3pm. Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath split-level home in Freemansburg, PA, where comfort meets convenience in every corner. Step into the spacious living and dining room combo, perfect for entertaining or relaxing with loved ones with a picture window allowing the perfect amount of light. The updated kitchen features stainless steel appliances, including a brand-new double oven gas range and beautiful granite countertopsa space ready to inspire your inner chef. On the second floor, you'll find three generously sized bedrooms and a full bath, offering convenience and plenty of room for all as well as a linen closet in the grand hall with access to attic storage. Head downstairs to the large, inviting family room, complete with a remodeled full bathroom featuring a walk-in shower with a modern shower head. Another level down, a versatile space awaits, perfect for a recreation room or home gym, and an office, along with a separate laundry room with extra storage. Added bonus with this home, the garage has a charging station for electric cars. Outside, your personal oasis awaits! The backyard features a 6-foot vinyl privacy fence, an 8x10 utility shed, and a partially covered patio perfect for outdoor dining. Relax under the gazebo with a hot tub that fits 6 people, or take a dip in your heated saltwater in-ground poola true retreat for every season. This welcoming home offers comfort, space, and an outdoor escape youll fall in love with. Schedule your showing today!

Beautifully maintained this brick ranch home features living room, formal dining room, large eat-in kitchen with SST appliances including refrigerator, diswasher, & microwave, loads of cabinet & counter space, & large double pantry, 3 nice size bedrooms, remodeled full hall bathroom completes the main floor. Full partially finished basement has a separate room that can be extra bedroom or office space, plus full bathroom with shower, laundry room, unfinished area of basement has plenty of storage space and outside entrance. Additional features include a 3-season screened-in sunroom, lovely .40 acre lot, 2-car attached garage, large garden shed. Roof replaced April 2018, electric heat-pump, central air, newer Pergo flooring in living room & dining room.

Discover unparalleled luxury & comfort in this STUNNING TOWNHOME located next to Lehigh University Athletic Fields, designed to captivate from the moment you step inside. With 4 spacious bedrooms which includes a LOWER LEVEL SUITE w/PRIVATE ENTRANCE, and 5 baths, this home is ideal for multi-generational living or those seeking exceptional space & luxury. The main level welcomes w/soaring VAULTED CEILINGS & exposed architectural beams, enhancing the OPEN, AIRY FEEL. A convenient ELEVATOR takes you to all 3 levels, where immaculate CUSTOM CABINETRY & INTRICATE WOODWORK showcase the exceptional craftsmanship that elevates each space. The expansive GOURMET KITCHEN is a true masterpiece, w/a 6-burner WOLF GAS COOKTOP, MONOGRAM refrigerator, and BOSCH dishwasher, just a few of the LUXE APPLIANCES. Ample prep space w/GRANITE countertops & a tiered BREAKFAST BAR blend style & functionality. Each bedroom is a retreat in itself, while the primary suite offers a spa-like bath & 2 walk-in closets. The indoor SALTWATER LAP POOL is pure enjoyment, and 4-SEASON SUNROOM with glass ceilings provides natural light. The in-law suite, w/its separate entrance & heated outdoor steps, KITCHENETTE & full bathroom, is perfect for extended family or guests, or as a dedicated HOME OFFICE. The exterior is equally impressive, w/manicured landscaping & a private backyard patio. This residence is a one-of-a-kind blend of luxury & practicality, offering you a refined lifestyle in an extraordinary setting.

Description Text: Welcome to your dream townhouse nestled in the countryside of Saucon Valley. This spacious home perfectly blends comfort and luxury for modern living. Step inside and be captivated by the quality craftsmanship evident throughout w/10 ft ceilings on the main level. The open floor plan allows natural light to flood the interior, creating an inviting atmosphere. The first-floor primary bedroom serves as a serene retreat, while the additional bedrooms and loft upstairs provide ample space and privacy for family or guests.The unfinished basement is ready to be converted to extra living space with 9ft ceilings and plumbing for a bathroom, or can serve you well as clean storage space. Situated in a beautiful neighborhood, this townhouse offers the best of both worlds a tranquil living environment with easy access to nearby attractions. Golf enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to the prestigious Saucon Valley Country Club. When it's time for some retail therapy or entertainment, The Promenade Shops at Saucon Valley, Downtown Bethlehem, and Hellertown's main street are just minutes away, featuring an array of shopping and dining experiences. The thoughtful design and prime location make it an ideal choice. Whether you're enjoying a quiet evening at home or exploring the many amenities of the area, this property offers the perfect balance of comfort and convenience.

Description Text: SPACIOUS, BEAUTIFUL, MOVE IN READY, AND UPDATED are some of the words to describe this Bethlehem SINGLE. This Corner lot BI-LEVEL is equipped with 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bath. The Sellers did not spare any expense when updating this gem. When walking into this beautiful gem just a few steps away, you're embraced with a large living room with a fireplace, then your STYLISH dining room, and a well-maintained kitchen. This floor also includes 2 additional bedrooms with a full bathroom and a master bedroom that includes a half bathroom. The lower level continues the well laid out floor plan with a Family room, another full bathroom, 4th bedroom, and a huge laundry room. Some additional features are a fenced in backyard, central AC, and a one car garage. PLUS, MORE!!! SET UP YOUR SHOWING TODAY!

This Ranch is move-in ready with a modern brand new kitchen w/quartz, SS appliances, tile flooring & backsplash and two colored cabinets will be a show off space plus perfect for everyday cooking. Freshly painted with new carpets in finished lower level adds great space to entertain & relax with extra space for a workshop and storage . The Enclosed patio adds to outside enjoyment in the warmer months . Corner lot with fenced-in yard in a great commuter location with access to 33, 78, & 22. Close to shopping & hospitals.

Welcome to 526 11th Avenue ~ This classic American Foursquare home combines timeless elegance & modern day amenities to meet the needs of today's lifestyle, while preserving it's historic charm & character! The welcoming covered front porch, beautiful landscape & private fenced-in yard make a fantastic first impression! Inside, original architectural elements such as oak hardwoods, 9'ceilings, chestnut millwork & stained glass windows grace this fine home! The inviting LR features a corner Brick FP & an abundance of natural light. The nicely appointed Kitchen boasts light wood cabinetry, quartz counter tops, subway tiled backsplash & gas cooking. Enjoy mealtime w/your friends & family in the adjoining DR. The (24' X 15') FR addition is ideal for all your special gatherings ~ featuring a cozy gas stove, w/w carpeting, convenient 1/2 Bath & picturesque views of the outdoors! Step outside, where you can unwind, entertain & connect w/nature on your NEW (16' X 10') Deck w/NEW retractable awning ~ overlooking the private & tranquil fenced-in yard, bordered by colorful perennial gardens, a handsome slate walkway, detached garage & off street parking! Three nicely proportioned Bdrms & a luxurious NEW Bathroom complete the 2nd Fl. The 3rd floor consists of 2 Bonus Rms for added storage. Within close proximity to major routes, vibrant Downtown Bethlehem, the community Rose Garden & Sand Island's Trail-head, for all your outdoor adventures. Clear CO & 1 Year Home Warranty included!

Located in the sought-after Rosemont development in West Bethlehem, this one of a kind 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath detached state-of-the-art smart home has been completely remodeled from top to bottom. Effortlessly opperate most features of the home by voice command. The renovation includes a new addition with a 2-car heated and cooled finished garage and a large living room with soaring cathedral ceilings. The open-concept first floor boasts a chef's kitchen with a large center island, quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances, formal dining room, and a primary suite featuring a walk-in closet, soaking tub, and custom walk-in shower. An additional bedroom and powder room complete the main level. The lower level offers a spacious 11-seat movie theater with electronic leather reclining seats and surround sound, a dedicated laundry room, utility room, two additional bedrooms, and a full bath with soaking tub and custom shower. The exterior features beautiful professional hardscaping, landscaping, a composite deck, paver walkways, an outdoor fire pit, and a paver patio with an outdoor kitchen, perfect for entertaining. New roof, windows, and siding. This home is conveniently located near shopping, dining, hospitals and other amenities, offering luxurious living in a prime location. Call to schedule your private showing today.

Tucked away on a quiet street in a beautiful neighborhood, this home is ready for new owners! With new flooring and paint throughout the first floor, the floorplan flows nicely for easy entertaining and everyday living! The chair rail and picture molding from the foyer flows into the Dining room with a large bay window. The living room is spacious with crown molding and French doors to separate the room from the Family Room. The Family room is anchored by a beautiful fireplace, flanked by floating shelves. The kitchen has an eat-in area, Quartz counters, painted cabinets, and appliances that remain. The first floor is completed by a convenient laundry room, closet, and powder room. The upstairs primary suite is massive with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom with tons of storage! Don't miss the three additional bedrooms of generous sizes! The additional full bathroom has a double vanity, large closet, and practical surround for the tub. The backyard oasis is a truly special find, with a covered porch, fenced in area, and privacy landscaping! The lower level is unfinished, but offers a multitude of possibilities with the exterior exit. Don't miss the oversized driveway, two car garage, new water heater, radon remediation system, and more!

Step into this SLEEK, MODERN MASTERPIECE in SAUCON VALLEY and feel the perfect blend of style, sophistication, and effortless living. Set on 2.5 LUSH ACRES, every inch of this home has been METICULOUSLY UPDATED to create a sense of luxury and comfort. The moment you walk through the door, you're welcomed by an atmosphere of warmth and elegance, where THOUGHTFUL DESIGN and HIGH-END FINISHES surround you. The open spaces invite you to relax and enjoy life, whether its hosting lively gatherings or quiet moments with loved ones. Light streams through every corner, casting a glow on the sleek finishes, while modern fixtures add a touch of refined glamour. From the intimate coziness of the STONE FIREPLACES to the expansive outdoor retreat, this home radiates a sense of peace and possibility. Imagine days spent lounging by the RESORT-STYLE HEATED POOL and SPA, and evenings warming by the FIRE PIT, while custom lighting creates an unforgettable ambiance. This is more than just a homeits a place where memories are made. With nearly over 7, 000 square feet of living space over 3 levels, this beautiful home seamlessly combines ELEGANCE with MODERN LUXURY. Offering the perfect backdrop for both lively get-togethers and private escapes, the WALKOUT LOWER LEVEL boasts 9ft ceilings, a THEATER ROOM, bar, FITNESS room, game room, and a full bath. Designed for those who value both style and substance, this home is a place to create a lifetime of special moments.

Beautiful 3 bd 3bth former model. Spacious Lincoln II Floor plan. Covered front porch. Beautiful open foyer, an office/den, Elegant solid oak staircase with metal spindles. an expanded Great Room, Gas fireplace with floor-to-ceiling stone surround. 4ft extension on Family Room and Master Bedroom. Gourmet Eat in Kitchen featuring Granite Island/ Quartz countertops tile backsplash, under cabinet lighting, JennAir stainless steel appliances, Vented to the outside, Mannington maple hardwood floors throughout the first level and Mohawk tile flooring in bathrooms. Oversized walk-in shower tile surround in Master Bathroom. Skylights in the Master bedroom, big walk-in closet, and wired window candles throughout. Flo By Moen water security system alerts in case of a leak anywhere in the home, pre-wired home theatre system, All seasons sun room/glass and screens, tile floors. Huge attic storage on the 2nd floor, central Vaccum system. The patio has a gas line for your grill. An automatic Sprinkler system in mulch beds. Great location close to the Clubhouse and pool so you don't miss out on any of the fun! All this and more in the desirable resort-style community of the Traditions of America at Bridle Path, you'll have access to endless activities, clubs, and amenities that make every day feel like a vacation. Dont miss the opportunity to make this dream home your reality!

Description Text: This single-family detached ranch home, lovingly cared for by its original owner for 48 years, is full of potential and ready for your personal touch! Featuring 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath on the main floor, this home offers comfortable, one-level living. The partially finished basement provides additional living space, previously used as a bedroom and kitchenette with an open living area, and includes a half bath for added convenience. The attached one-car garage offers inside entry and a rear entrance, while the large corner lot provides ample space for outdoor activities, gardens, and relaxation. The property also includes a shed and a spacious driveway with access from both streets, offering parking for up to 4 cars. This home has great bones and a fantastic layout. Perfect for those looking to add their own style and make it their own. This home is the perfect opportunity to invest in a prime Bethlehem location! Don't miss out on this gem with endless potential!

Wonderful opportunity to own this care-free condo in desirable Eagle Trace! As soon as you enter, this feels like home! The 22 ft vaulted ceiling offers a bright and airy foyer. Look up and admire the newly installed 72 fan that allows fresh airflow throughout. The living room is cozy and flows effortlessly into the kitchen. This open concept is sure to please! Right off of the kitchen is the dining area which overlooks a spacious and serene deck. A 1/2 bathroom, and closet for storage complete this level. Upstairs you can retreat to the master bedroom that has Beautiful sliding barn doors to the big closet perfect for your array of fashion. There are two additional spacious and well lit bedrooms for you to enjoy. The full bathroom has recently been professionally and completely remodeled, and features a dual sink, walk in tile shower, and all the modern taste and amenities you desire! The unfinished lower level is great for storage, or awaits your customization. The laundry is also housed in the lower level. This meticulously maintained home is conveniently located near Route 22, 191, shopping, eateries, and the areas best healthcare! This is the home you have been waiting for!
Address: 1744 Falcon Dr Unit S, Bethlehem PA 18017

Description Text: Nestled on a peaceful street directly across from the beautiful Bethlehem Rose Garden, this charming 3-bedroom home offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Not to mention a beautifully finished off basement ! With its prime location, youre just moments away from the heart of town, giving you easy access to local shops, dining, festivals at the Garden, festivals downtown Bethlehem and entertainment. Inside, youll find spacious living areas filled with natural light, a well-appointed kitchen, and cozy bedrooms that are perfect for relaxing at the end of the day. The outdoor space is ideal for enjoying quiet mornings or evening strolls in the nearby park. This is a rare opportunity to live in a serene setting while being in the middle of everything Bethlehem has to offer. Your Nitschmann Middle School is only .2 miles away!! Dont miss your chance to make this home yours! This one will go very fast. LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION Have a great showing !!!!!

Set on 2.5 LUSH ACRES, every inch of this home has been METICULOUSLY UPDATED to create a sense of luxury and comfort. Welcome to 924 Evergreen Place in North Bethlehems Estates at Forest Hills. The current owner custom-designed and built this unique two-story colonial to fit her young family at the time. It has a spacious first-floor master suite, four bedrooms, and two full baths on the second floor. All the bedrooms have an abundance of closet space, with multiple walk-in closets. The foyer has gleaming hardwood floors that extend to the dining room on the left and straight through to the living room (currently used as her music room). The foyer and living room have 18 ceilings with expansive windows providing lots of natural light. The first-floor master suite is on the west side of the house, separated from the main living areas. It offers a large bedroom with bay windows overlooking the backyard, a large walk-in closet, a double-door closet, a spacious bath with double vanities, a deep jetted tub, and a stall shower. The open-concept kitchen, breakfast area, and family room are on the east side of the main level. The family room has a cathedral ceiling, gas fireplace, ceiling fan, lots of windows, and access to the rear patio. The four bedrooms on the second level share two full baths. Two bedrooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom, and the other two share the main hall bath. The main hallway on the second level overlooks the foyer and living room. The unfinished basement has a 10 ceiling, making it perfect for your custom-designed family room, in-home gym, just storage

Welcome to this immaculately maintained 2-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom end-unit condo, offering both comfort and convenience. This beautifully kept home boasts an updated kitchen with modern finishes. Step outside to enjoy your private deck, ideal for relaxing with a morning coffee or hosting friends. The spacious layout includes a bright and airy living area, with plenty of natural light flowing through the end-units extra windows. Other highlights include a 1-car garage with additional storage space and the ease of low-maintenance living. Whether you're a first-time buyer or downsizer this clean and move-in-ready property is a must-see! See the attached list of the many items that have been updated or replaced.
Address: 555 Vera Cir Unit F, Bethlehem PA 18017

Description Text: | DISCOVER THIS CHARMING HOME FEATURING A SPACIOUS LAYOUT AND COMFORTABLE LIVING SPACES | KEY FEATURES | ENJOY A GENEROUSLY SIZED LIVING ROOM PERFECT FOR ENTERTAINING FAMILY AND FRIENDS OR SIMPLY RELAXING AFTER A LONG DAY | THIS BRIGHT AND AIRY SPACE PROVIDES ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR FURNITURE ARRANGEMENT | EACH BEDROOM OFFERS AMPLE SPACE, ENSURING COMFORT AND PRIVACY FOR EVERYONE IN THE FAMILY. GREAT FOR CHILDREN, GUESTS, OR AS A HOME OFFICE | A FUNCTIONAL KITCHEN WITH PLENTY OF COUNTER SPACE AND STORAGE, READY FOR YOUR PERSONAL TOUCH | A BACKYARD PERFECT FOR BBQs, PLAYTIME, OR GARDENING | DON'T MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY TO OWN A BEAUTIFUL HOME IN BETHLEHEM | YOUR DREAM HOME AWAITS AT 420 LIBERTY STREET |

This perfect RANCH home in Bethlehem awaits it's new owners! This 3 bed/ 2 bath property in East Allen Township offers plenty of living space with a full finished BASEMENT and a large sunroom/ family room on the first floor, leading out to a deck overlooking a flat back yard. With some TLC, this property could serve as a perfect starter or retirement home. The two car garages offers plenty of space for your vehicles, equipment and toys, or both! The wood burning fireplace in the basement is perfect for supplemental heating on cold winter nights and the custom bar offers a neat little space for entertaining your guests. Only 15 minutes away from Downtown Bethlehem, 20 minutes from the SteelStacks in the Historic District, and Wind Creek Casino and Event Center!
Property is being sold in As Is condition. Features include 4 bedrooms, 2 full baths, large sun room, laundry 1st floor, 1/2 acre parcel, less than 1 mile to major highways and shopping.

Welcome to 1924 Peach Tree Ln, a Saucon Valley Colonial where charm meets modern convenience. With 5 BR, 3.5 BA and 3950 SF, this Blair-built home has enough room for you, your family & maybe even your in-laws! Enter through the foyer, complete with a grand staircase thats just begging for a dramatic descentperfect for reenacting every period drama you've ever watched. Hardwood floors sweep through the main areas of the home, gleaming with the kind of confidence only a well-maintained Colonial can muster. The kitchen? Plenty of counter space, plus a breakfast nook that practically demands you linger over coffee just a little longer. The main floor primary suite? Gracious in size with a walk-in closet that says, Go ahead, buy more shoes. The ensuite is a bonusbecause, lets face it, you deserve it. The spacious mud room is conveniently located. Upstairs are 4 well appointed bedrooms, with light pouring into every room. Outside, you'll be in awe of the low maintenance exterior, beautiful yard and mature landscaping as you relax in your screened-in porch. Double decks, w/ one awning-covered, give you lots of entertaining options. With this oversized driveway and a 3 car garage, parking drama is a thing of the past. Picture perfect here in this cul-de-sac location. This is the kind of home that makes adulting look good. Contact your favorite agent for a private showing! Description Text: Welcome to this enchanting Arts & Crafts style home in West Bethlehem, where timeless elegance meets modern convenience. Featuring three spacious bedrooms and one refreshed bathroom, this residence showcases stunning original details, including gorgeous hardwood floors, intricate woodwork, and charming window seats. The generous living room and bright formal dining room provide plenty of space for entertaining, while the updated kitchen is a culinary haven, complete with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a chic subway tile backsplash. You'll appreciate the practicality of four walk-in closets and additional storage in the expansive full basement. Step outside to unwind on the delightful 24-foot front porch or host summer barbecues on the private back patio, all nestled within a beautifully landscaped yard. Off-street parking for up to three vehicles adds to the convenience of this remarkable property. With 9-foot ceilings and a warm, inviting ambiance, this home exudes character and charm. All appliances are included, and the economical gas heating ensures comfort and ease for modern living. Dont miss your chance to make this gem your own!

Beautifully charming, Bethlehem colonial! Open living room with hardwood floors, full dining room, eat in kitchen, large laundry room, and half bath on the first floor. Spacious and dry basement offers plenty of storage! Upstairs, you have three nice bedrooms, Master bedroom features a large walk in closet with an additional bonus closet. Large main bath. The third floor features a third full bathroom and a potential fourth bedroom thats easy to finish! Great location in West Bethlehem near downtown shops, restaurants, and more! dont forget the large fenced yard and the large detached garage with tons more storage space! Dont miss out on this beautifully maintained home with classic features. Long-term owners are sad to leave! Home is an excellent condition and sold as is.

Charming Fixer-Upper with Tons of Potential! This solid 4-bedroom, 1.5-bath home is full of potential, perfect for buyers looking to add their personal touch! Nestled in a great neighborhood, this home offers a newer roof and a maintained boiler, ensuring peace of mind as you embark on your renovation journey. Conveniently located near Clearview Park and Pool, its a quick walk to recreational activities and nature. With easy access to Rt 378 and Rt 22, commuting and getting around town is a breeze. Whether you're an investor or someone looking to create your dream home, this property provides a fantastic opportunity to add value. Come see the possibilities!
Come view this wonderful 1, 729 sq ft home with 3 bedrooms and 1 bath. Great storage in the basement along with a 1 car detached garage. Seller is motivated, bring all offers!!!

A HOME THAT BRINGS ELEGANCE TO EVERY ASPECT OF LIFE! Its a classically proportioned and appointed house that exhales sophistication and class, nestled in the old Rosemont section of Bethlehem. Built in 1928, this 5-BR, 4.5 BA masterpiece was completely renovated in 2022/2024. A grand, central foyer welcomes you into a sunlit living room on one side and a formal dining room on the other, both with elegant crown molding and natural wood floors. The living room features a fireplace with a ceramic tiled hearth and walls of built-in bookshelves for all your favorite books. Two sets of French doors open to a lovely, enclosed breezeway, perfect for cool summer nights or watching the colors of fall. The dining room connects to a spacious family room with fireplace, built-ins, and bay window. Any cook would love the kitchen, with Nero Marquina marble floors; custom tall wood cabinets; six-burner, stainless steel stove; stainless steel appliances; and a breakfast nook with built-in bench for cozy coffee breaks. A butlers pantry is equipped with a sink, cabinets, and wine storage. The second floor is just as refined: The master ensuite has a gas fireplace, double vanity, marble floors with radiant heat, glass enclosed steam shower and a dressing room, two sizeable bedrooms with a Jack-N-Jill bath and a room with a wood-burning fireplace & bedroom complete the second floor. On the third is expansive wood beamed bonus room with adjacent bedroom and full bathroom, perfect for guests or extended family. Outside, large trees and manicured gardens frame the house while a full basement and two-car garage complete the picture. Sellers are offering all the furniture and furnishings that were selected and purchased exclusively for this home and less than a year old. THIS PROPERTY IS FIRST-CLASS INSIDE AND OUT DONT MISS IT!

Special Financing Offer 5.625% and/or 100% financing! Welcome to 3157 Beaufort Drive on the North side of the City of Bethlehem near Hanover Township! Move in ready for the lucky new owner! Recent renovations include a gorgeous master bathroom complete with a 5x6 Tile Shower with rain shower head and double bowl high key white vanity, fresh neutral paint throughout the home, expanding the rooms on the main living area into one large great room, new tile in the additional bathrooms as well as new vanities, wood luxury plank flooring, new modern lighting fixtures, freshened up landscaping and some new windows. Drive into this neighborhood an pull right into your two car garage with inside access to the expansive main floor with an open layout perfect for entertaining or large family get together. Enjoy afternoons on the deck over looking the side yard on this .37 acre lot. Laundry is located on the 1st floor just off the kitchen. Upstairs the master suite with en suite bathroom, walk in closet and vaulted ceilings will impress you! Down the hall check out the other two large bedrooms and updated full bathroom. Amazing closet space and storage in all the bedrooms. Downstairs check out the 1100 sq ft unfinished basement perfect for storage, hobbies or finishing into additional living space. This home sits convenient to Routes 22 and 33 for the commuter too. Home serviced by public water and public sewer and heat pump HVAC. Owner willing to consider Cash, FHA, VA and & Conventional Financing buyers.

Two Houses! Both beautifully renovated and fully furnished single homes situated on a spacious lot with a tranquil creek in the backyard is perfect for multigenerational living or rental potential- live in one and rent the other! The 1st floor in the main house features hardwood floors, an updated eat-in kitchen with a center island, & stainless steel appliances. The open dining area flows into a welcoming living room filled with natural light. Also on this level, youll find a versatile main floor bedroom that can serve as an office, a spacious laundry room, & a full bath. Upstairs, there are two additional bedrooms, one featuring an ensuite bath. The cottage offers one floor living, complete with a spacious kitchen, living room, bedroom, & full bath with laundry. Each home has separate off-street parking. Outside, enjoy a private backyard with a shed, 30-foot dog run, & the serene sounds of the creek where ducks often visit! Many systems that are all less than 5 years old include a furnace/water heater combo unit, water filtration w/ reverse osmosis, & 3 mini-splits. New roof in 2016! These homes are move-in ready and offer an excellent investment opportunity, with a reliable and quiet tenant in the cottage who is interested in a long-term lease. Located on a quiet street, youll enjoy a peaceful atmosphere while being just minutes from restaurants, shopping, hospitals, & easy highway access. Dont miss the chance to explore the possibilities this property offers!

Welcome to this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath Cape Cod featuring a brick and vinyl faade, complete with a cozy covered front porch. Inside, the living room offers wall-to-wall carpet, a ceiling fan, and a beautiful brick-front fireplace. The home boasts a versatile den/study/office and a formal dining room for entertaining. The spacious eat-in kitchen shines with recessed lighting, a mosaic tile backsplash, ceiling fan, and a convenient laundry area. A full bath on the main level includes a walk-in shower with glass sliding doors. Enjoy the sunroom with vaulted ceilings and direct access to the backyard. Upstairs, all bedrooms feature luxury vinyl plank flooring and ceiling fans, with the second full bath showcasing tiled floors, walls, and a vaulted ceiling. Outside, relax on the concrete patio with a trellis surround, or take advantage of the detached 2-car garage and oversized paved driveway. Conveniently located close to major highways US-22, PA-33 and I-78 for easy commute to NY and NJ, Monocacy Park, Lehigh University, Green Pond and Northampton Country Clubs, Lehigh Valley International Airport, shops, restaurants and so much more! This home offers both comfort and style! Schedule a showing today!

This single-family detached ranch home, lovingly cared for by its original owner for 48 years, is full of potential and ready for your personal touch! Featuring 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath on the main floor, this home offers comfortable, one-level living. The partially finished basement provides additional living space, previously used as a bedroom and kitchenette with an open living area, and includes a half bath for added convenience. The attached one-car garage offers inside entry and a rear entrance, while the large corner lot provides ample space for outdoor activities, gardens, and relaxation. The property also includes a shed and a spacious driveway with access from both streets, offering parking for up to 4 cars. This home has great bones and a fantastic layout. Perfect for those looking to add their own style and make it their own. This home is the perfect opportunity to invest in a prime Bethlehem location! Don't miss out on this gem with endless potential!

Beautifully maintained this brick ranch home features living room, formal dining room, large eat-in kitchen with SST appliances including refrigerator, diswasher, & microwave, loads of cabinet & counter space, & large double pantry, 3 nice size bedrooms, remodeled full hall bathroom completes the main floor. Full partially finished basement has a separate room that can be extra bedroom or office space, plus full bathroom with shower, laundry room, unfinished area of basement has plenty of storage space and outside entrance. Additional features include a 3-season screened-in sunroom, lovely .40 acre lot, 2-car attached garage, large garden shed. Roof replaced April 2018, electric heat-pump, central air, newer Pergo flooring in living room & dining room.

Discover unparalleled luxury & comfort in this STUNNING TOWNHOME located next to Lehigh University Athletic Fields, designed to captivate from the moment you step inside. With 4 spacious bedrooms which includes a LOWER LEVEL SUITE w/PRIVATE ENTRANCE, and 5 baths, this home is ideal for multi-generational living or those seeking exceptional space & luxury. The main level welcomes w/soaring VAULTED CEILINGS & exposed architectural beams, enhancing the OPEN, AIRY FEEL. A convenient ELEVATOR takes you to all 3 levels, where immaculate CUSTOM CABINETRY & INTRICATE WOODWORK showcase the exceptional craftsmanship that elevates each space. The expansive GOURMET KITCHEN is a true masterpiece, w/a 6-burner WOLF GAS COOKTOP, MONOGRAM refrigerator, and BOSCH dishwasher, just a few of the LUXE APPLIANCES. Ample prep space w/GRANITE countertops & a tiered BREAKFAST BAR blend style & functionality. Each bedroom is a retreat in itself, while the primary suite offers a spa-like bath & 2 walk-in closets. The indoor SALTWATER LAP POOL is pure enjoyment, and 4-SEASON SUNROOM with glass ceilings provides natural light. The in-law suite, w/its separate entrance & heated outdoor steps, KITCHENETTE & full bathroom, is perfect for extended family or guests, or as a dedicated HOME OFFICE. The exterior is equally impressive, w/manicured landscaping & a private backyard patio. This residence is a one-of-a-kind blend of luxury & practicality, offering you a refined lifestyle in an extraordinary setting.

Built by one of the most sought-after custom builders in the Valley, Erwin Forrest Builders, & designed by Daniel Ebner Architects, this community is sited on some of the most beautiful & convenient land in the Lehigh Valley. Five unique models to choose from. High-end finishes including Marvin windows, James Hardie siding, custom stained front door, hardwood floors, full basements, & much more. 1st floor master suites or an elevator option for our true two-story homes. MULTIPLE OFFERS RECEIVED, HIGHEST and BEST DUE SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 2nd at NOON.This 840 sq ft 3 bedroom, 1 full bath home is brimming with potential and just waiting for your personal touch. With a solid foundation, this property offers an ideal canvas for renovation enthusiasts or first-time buyers looking to invest in a project. The additional 700 sq ft lower level is a blank slate, perfect for creating extra living space, a workshop, or a home gymlet your imagination run wild! Situated in a desirable neighborhood, this north Bethlehem property is priced to sell as is, making it an excellent opportunity for those looking to customize their home or flip for a profit. Cozy Cape Cod style home with pride of ownership! This beauty features 4 bedrooms and a fully updated bath. Living room with gleaming hardwood floors and natural sunlight throughout the day. Kitchen was previously updated with oak cabinets. There is a window view of the tranquil yard and a door for easy access to the backyard. The main floor is also boosted with an updated bathroom, and for your convenience, 2 bedrooms (one of the rooms are being used as a dining room). The 2nd floor features 2 spacious bedrooms. The basement offers plenty of storage, a laundry area and a bilco door. In the future this can be finished for more living space. NEW HVAC & WATER HEATER The backyard is just perfect for your relaxation. The Seller has cared for and completed a lot of work during ownership. This is conveniently located close to EVERYTHING e.g. schools, shopping, restaurants, public transportation etc. Priced to sell!

As you enter the home the foyer opens up to a dining room that can be made formal or kept casual depending on your preference. On the opposite side of the hall you will find the entrance to the guest quarters complete with two bedrooms and a full bathroom. With a large walk-in closet and full bathroom that includes a spa-like tiled shower, water closet, and double vanities there is nothing left to be desired.

Step into this immaculate 5-bedroom, 3.5-bath Colonial, lovingly maintained by its original owners. This elegant home seamlessly blends classic charm with modern conveniences. Featuring beautiful hardwood floors throughout, a remodeled kitchen with brand-new stainless-steel appliances, and quartz countertops, this home is a perfect blend of style and functionality. The spacious first-floor primary suite is ideal for an in-law suite or private retreat, complete with easy access to the main living areas. Cozy up in the family room by the gas fireplace or entertain guests at the custom wet bar. (First fl. hallways and bathroom can accommodate wheelchair.) The open floor plan flows effortlessly into the tranquil backyard, where privacy trees create a serene oasis for outdoor living. Upstairs boasts 3 spacious bedrooms, plus primary bedroom, with double closets, and ceiling fan lights. Primary bedroom also has tray ceilings with spacious ensuite and skylight. With two-zone central air conditioning and heating, which are two years old, youll enjoy year-round comfort. The home also boasts a two-year-old roof, a 2-car garage, and an outdoor shed and a full dry basement for extra storage. Dont miss your chance to own this stunning home, offering everything you need and more! Schedule your private showing today and make this house your forever home!

Welcome to this beautifully updated 2-bed, 2.5-bath, two-story condo in the highly sought-after Carver House on Bethlehem's Northside! Enter through a private partially fenced porch through the front door to a tiled foyer with a coat closet. The main floor features a sunny breakfast area with extra cabinet space and granite countertops, leading to an updated kitchen with solid wood cabinetry, new granite counters, and a full stainless steel appliance package. Flowing from the kitchen, the spacious dining room and living area feature a floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace and sliding doors to a cozy covered patio. Hardwood flooring graces the main level, with tile in the kitchen and half bath. Upstairs, enjoy hardwood throughout, a cozy secondary bedroom, a walk-in hall closet, and a bright primary suite with an updated tile bathroom and a walk-in shower. The fully waterproofed basement with dual sump pumps ensures a dry, functional space. Talk about pride in ownership! This condo is economically efficient with forced-air heat and central AC. HOA benefits include lawn care, snow removal, trash, water, sewer, roof, basic cable, and landscaping, providing easy living and peace of mind. Each condo comes with 2 parking spaces. One assigned with # and additional unmarked. Enjoy low taxes in this North Bethlehem gemmove-in ready and meticulously maintained! Open house November 3rd 2024 from 11am-1pm.

Description Text: This delightful 3-bed, 1-bath detached Colonial exudes classic charm & modern comfort.
